queries.graphs: SELECT ?graph ?label ?tripleCount ?domain WHERE { ?graph a db:NamedGraph . ?graph rdfs:label ?label . ?graph db:tripleCount ?tripleCount . ?graph db:domain ?domain . }
queries.entities: SELECT ?entity ?label ?type ?graph WHERE { ?entity a db:Entity . ?entity rdfs:label ?label . ?entity db:entityType ?type . ?entity db:graph ?graph . }
queries.performance: SELECT ?metric ?lookupTime ?lookupRate ?insertRate ?memoryPerTriple WHERE { ?metric a db:PerformanceData . ?metric db:lookupTime ?lookupTime . ?metric db:lookupRate ?lookupRate . ?metric db:insertRate ?insertRate . ?metric db:memoryPerTriple ?memoryPerTriple . }
